sections.heading: 01|Acquisition of railway right of way definitions
sections.text: Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in sections5551.01to5551.10, inclusive, of the Revised Code:(A) "Street or interurban railway company" includes any person, associ

sections.heading: 09, inclusive, of the Revised Code, do not limit or impair the jurisdiction or control, which is or may be conferred upon the public utilities commission over the abandonment or change of route, termini, facilities, or service of any street or interurban railway company
